item.name: Castaways
item.comment:
Has a lot of similarities with Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island, but still enough to be a different and good game - not just another rip-off. I think that Robinson Crusoe is the better game, with the many different adventures, which Castaways doesn't have, but more plays of both games will tell.
Second game - lowered my rating to 7, from 8. Last time, we all played much more co-op than second, and we got busted by playing way to self-centred. The only thing, that made this game feel different, was the change in the style of our play.

item.name: Dog
item.comment: Not a bad game, but it really sucks, if you don't get any cards, drawn or from your mate, that lets you out - and yes, it did happen to me, at my first game of Dog. Oh well, I got some, but they could be counted on a hand with six fingers, I think.

item.name: The Hunger Games: District 12 Strategy Game
Hunter's Guild: The Vampire Forest
item.comment: This game is pure shit! Horrific game! How can anyone design such a shitty game, for adult gamers, and call it anything beyond terrible? I wish I could give it a lower rating, but BGG haven't made that available - so my 1 is actually pretty high, compared to what I'd give it if I could! Robb De Nicola and Epic Scale Games - go to hell!

item.name: Love Letter
item.comment:
A nice, and fast, little game, with a nicely drawn princess ;)
German first edition got bigger cards - Dixit size, some says, but I've never seen a Dixit card - and red heart tokens instead of red cubes.

item.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Rise of the Runelords – Base Set
item.comment:
The game is good, the idea is very nice - but the many errors in the rulebook and on the cards, drags my rating down with at least 0.5, and another 0.5 is lost because all the scenarios feels the same - turn a card, roll some dice, close the location, catch the bad guy, done - hooray! Or not.. But I am a sucker for fantasy, and cards - and there is a LOT of cards in here!
Rise of the Runelords adventure packs - 3/6.
With character add-on pack.

item.name: Trains
item.comment: A rating of 5 is my initial rating - it will probably be higher, when I get to play it again with more than two players, preferably four, and some other set ups. The one in my first game, with two players, was really, really boring! I really hope, that I'll get around to have just some love for this game!
